title: biotrace_extract_container.py --print-json output
description: Schema for the JSON emitted by scripts/biotrace_extract_container.py --print-json.

$schema.description: Optional schema hint for editors/validators (points at this schema's $id).

input.description: Path to the container or directory that was extracted.

outdir.description: Output directory where files were extracted.

main.description: Primary extracted file path (the one you usually pass as --input). Null on error.

extracted.description: All extracted/copied file paths. The first entry is usually the same as 'main'.
